remarks: The predicate "is a terminal object" of a category.  (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)
statement:
isinito.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isinito.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
isinito.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
isinito.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. B ) $.
istermo $p |- ( ph -> ( I e. ( TermO ` C ) <-> A. b e. B E! h h e. ( b H I ) ) ) $.
$d B b $.
$d C b h $.
$d I b h $.
